data.projectdescription: This study project was made during studying ReactJS at nFactorial School 🚀.

data.projectname: 🐕Pet-project: 🤖 Telegram Bot informing about weather condition ☔🌡☁
data.projectdescription: This Telegram bot parses weather information based on city name a user sends to the bot.

data.projectname: 🤖 Telegram Bot for Allur company's HR
data.projectdescription: I've made Telegram bot for Allur company's HR. The bot helps the employees getting information via bot commands that send HR documents 📁 and forms 📃.

This web application notifies via email all subscribers if rain is forecasted to happen in the selected city. The client-side is made at React.JS (Vite + Material UI). Server-side is made at Node.JS (Express.JS + MongoDB).
